title: Reincarnated Undefeated Other World Sage – Banished Because “I’m Not a Brave Man,” but I’m the Strongest In the World! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Game Elements   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Aotsuki Kouji   蒼月浩二
description:
Yuki, who defeated the popular net game’s Last Boss with the broken character “Sage”, was forcibly reincarnated in a different world.

When he woke up, there were seven heroes and a king. Yuki was summoned as the eighth hero.

However,

“Sage? I don’t know It. If you’re not a hero then get out of my sight!”

Yuki, who was unilaterally banished, was left to survive in a different world with no money.

“This is crazy! They really kicked me out!”

But the king and the seven heroes didn’t know.

That “Sage” is the strongest job in another world.

“! … we shouldn’t have banished him that time.” Even if they regretted it, it was already too late.>
